Euromeeting Round Table 76 Bree

Euromeeting 2016 for the RT76

Program

September 16-17-18 2016

Early bird special : thursday sept 15

  • Light Lunch @
  • Gin tasting: selection of the finest Gins Belgium has to offer

Friday sept 16

  • Breakfast
  • Adventurepark “de Warre”
    • to give you an idea
    • Word of advise: bring spare clothes & shoes
  • Lunch @ Giuliano Maasmechelen
  • Some free time to explore Maasmechelen Outlet Shopping Village
  • Evening: party @ Paul’s Place with:
    • Belgian fries
    • Variety of beers from our local brewery Cornelissen

Saturday sept 17

  • Breakfast
  • Official visit to the city hall of Bree
  • Lunch @ Pollismolen
  • Guided visit of brewery Martens
  • Evening: Gala @ Brewery Museum

Sunday sept 18

  • Farewell brunch @ Mussenburghof
